summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York for Ghislaine Maxwell, commanding law enforcement to arrest her. The warrant lists charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. It was issued by Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of offenses including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. magistrate judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell based on an indictment, listing multiple federal charges related to the sexual exploitation of minors.

keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2020.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.
The charges listed include conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The warrant is based on an indictment filed with the court.
The case number and contact information for an AUSA (Assistant United States Attorney) are referenced, though the AUSA's name is not provided in the visible text.
